{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$12.7M in 2021-2022** on contracts with PYLON ELECTRONICS.

Across 6 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 2 have at least one amendment (33%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 125% and the average number of amendments was 1.5. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$275.9K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 2.26 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$10.6M. The longest contract was 5 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$63.4M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
